resources.string: An easy and simple way to stay connected and collaborate with alumni and students of STT-NF.
Look for users by hobbies, study program, or collaboration interests. Getting to know each other has never been easier!
Share stories, find inspiring research or projects, continue where others left off, or start a new one!
Be part of the community, today.
Please input your account details into the corresponding fields.
Just type in your NF campus email, and we\'ll do the rest!
